name: Azure App Registration and Enterprise Application Orchestrator
description: The Azure App Registration and Enterprise Application Orchestrator extension remotely manages both Azure App Registration/Application certificates and Enterprise Application/Service Principal certificates.

store_types.Name: Azure App Registration (Application)
store_types.ClientMachineDescription: The Azure Tenant (directory) ID that owns the Service Principal.
store_types.StorePathDescription: The Application ID of the target Application/Service Principal that will be managed by the Azure App Registration and Enterprise Application Orchestrator extension.

Properties.Name: ServerUsername
Properties.Description: The Application ID of the Service Principal used to authenticate with Microsoft Graph for managing Application/Service Principal certificates.

Properties.Name: ServerPassword
Properties.Description: A Client Secret that the extension will use to authenticate with Microsoft Graph for managing Application/Service Principal certificates, OR the password that encrypts the private key in ClientCertificate

Properties.Name: ClientCertificate
Properties.Description: The client certificate used to authenticate with Microsoft Graph for managing Application/Service Principal certificates. See the [requirements](#client-certificate-or-client-secret) for more information.

Properties.Name: AzureCloud
Properties.Description: Specifies the Azure Cloud instance used by the organization.

Properties.Name: ServerUseSsl
Properties.Description: Specifies whether SSL should be used for communication with the server. Set to 'true' to enable SSL, and 'false' to disable it.

store_types.Name: Azure Enterprise Application (Service Principal)
store_types.ClientMachineDescription: The Azure Tenant (directory) ID that owns the Service Principal.
store_types.StorePathDescription: The Application ID of the target Application/Service Principal that will be managed by the Azure App Registration and Enterprise Application Orchestrator extension.

Properties.Name: ServerUsername
Properties.Description: The Application ID of the Service Principal used to authenticate with Microsoft Graph for managing Application/Service Principal certificates.

Properties.Name: ServerPassword
Properties.Description: A Client Secret that the extension will use to authenticate with Microsoft Graph for managing Application/Service Principal certificates, OR the password that encrypts the private key in ClientCertificate

Properties.Name: ClientCertificate
Properties.Description: The client certificate used to authenticate with Microsoft Graph for managing Application/Service Principal certificates. See the [requirements](#client-certificate-or-client-secret) for more information.

Properties.Name: AzureCloud
Properties.Description: Specifies the Azure Cloud instance used by the organization.

Properties.Name: ServerUseSsl
Properties.Description: Specifies whether SSL should be used for communication with the server. Set to 'true' to enable SSL, and 'false' to disable it.
